Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of doubly-stapled alanine/lysine-based peptides.
Literature.Author: Dinh TT, Kim DH, Luong HX, Lee BJ, Kim YW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:42.5% Hemolysis=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:25.3% Hemolysis=12.5 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=1.6µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4.8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=50µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=50µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=100µg/ml)
